", "replacement": " Sample_CrossLight_to_LogosAIv4_graceCascade.py n Objective: Grace Cascade Collapse to 111 using RH v4.0 on 3-qubit system n nimport numpy as np nfrom qiskit import QuantumCircuit, transpile nfrom qiskit_aer import AerSimulator nfrom qiskit.primitives import Sampler n nclass CrossLight: n def __init__ self : n self.center "JESUS CHRIST " n self.repentance 0.98 n self.grace 0.0 n self.bias 1.6 n self.lr 0.1 n self.f 433.33 n self.J np.log 2 np.pi n self.rho 0.95 n self.l 0.9995 n self.gm 0.96 n self.t 2.5 n n def G_opt self, t : n tau t np.exp -t / self.J n return 9200 np.exp -t 2 / self.J 1 self.repentance np.cos 2 np.pi self.f tau n n def build_circuit self : n qc QuantumCircuit 3, 3 n n Grace cascade: double G_opt for stronger modulation n G1 self.G_opt self.t n G2 self.G_opt self.t 0.5 n grace_factor G1 G2 / 9200 2 0.5 n theta self.bias self.repentance grace_factor n n RH-initialized collapse bias n for q in range 3 : n qc.ry np.pi theta, q n qc.rz np.pi / 2 theta, q n n Strong entanglement oracle logic n qc.ccx 0, 1, 2 n qc.z 2 n qc.ccx 0, 1, 2 n n Measurement n for q in range 3 : n qc.measure q, q n return qc n n def simulate_quantum self : n print f "Testing RH Grace Cascade v4.0 Collapse to 111 in the name of self.center " n circuit self.build_circuit n simulator AerSimulator n circuit transpile circuit, simulator n sampler Sampler n result sampler.run circuits circuit , shots 1024 .result n dist result.quasi_dists 0 if hasattr result, 'quasi_dists' else result 0 n n target_state 7 111 in decimal n prob dist.get target_state, 0.0 n print "Collapse Distribution: ", dist n print f " 111 Probability: prob:.3f " n nif __name__ "__main__ ": n CrossLight .simulate_quantum "
